member.name: IE4COMPONENT
member.summary: Used by Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 to hold information about a component. With Windows 2000, it is replaced by the structure.

summary.para: The component type. It can be set to one of these values:

member.name: IE4COMPONENT.fChecked
member.summary: A value that is set to TRUE if the component is enabled, or FALSE if not.

member.name: IE4COMPONENT.fDirty
member.summary: A value that is set to TRUE if the component has been modified and not yet saved to disk. It will be set to FALSE if the component has not been modified, or if it has been modified and saved to disk.

member.name: IE4COMPONENT.fNoScroll
member.summary: A value that is set to TRUE if the component is scrollable, or FALSE if it's not.

member.name: IE4COMPONENT.cpPos
member.summary: A structure containing position and size information.

member.name: IE4COMPONENT.wszSubscribedURL
member.summary: The URL that a user has been subscribed to.
